Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 48th overall pick, by Detroit in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/1/2015...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/2016, going 3-2, 1.74...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,450,000 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,450,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/10/2018 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Won Gold Glove at Pitcher in 2018...
1/31/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,450,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/3/2019 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/3/2020 to a 4-year deal worth $8,000,000 per year...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Brooklyn on 6/2/2021, striking out 10...
Was claimed off waivers by St. Louis (C) on 6/21/2021.
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2021, going 3-0, 0.33...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Detroit on 4/21/2023 (Going to DET: P Thomas Svoboda, CF Rodney Mundy, P Silvio Sanchez. Going to STL: CF Issac Scott)...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/15/2024 to a 4-year deal worth $3,400,000 per year...
Injured on 6/26/2024 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Gold Glove at Pitcher in 2024...
